Zlatá Lípa, abandoned quarry – part of a lava flow with distinctive coarsely basaltic parting uncovered by mining

Zlatá Lípa, abandoned quarry – middle part of the abandoned quarry with a preserved node of basalt with instructive ball structure parting

Zlatá Lípa, abandoned quarry – a block of lava left upstanding with a ball structure parting and clearly visible coarse ball nodular structure
